about.details:
Incorporated in 2010, Madhya Pradesh Today Media Limited is primarily engaged in the publication of newspaper, news through newsportal and event based magazine. They are a publishing house having a daily evening Hindi newspaper that was primarily launched in MP and is currently available in Chhattisgarh, UP, Delhi and Maharashtra.

The group has also launched a Morning Daily soon thereafter in the year 2010. Now it also has plans to start publication and printing in other States of India in the years to come. The company has a strong team of experts having wide experience in print media. Pradesh Today has all 12-page colored newspaper with an internationally acceptable size form – The first of its type in the Madhya Pradesh State.

Pradesh today now covers entire Zone’s all over the Madhya Pradesh by contributing its morning newspaper in 52 Districts of Madhya Pradesh state like Hoshangabad, Vidisha, Dhar, Neemuch, Sagar, Shivpuri, etc. Pradesh today is the only newspaper covering both evening as well as morning newspaper.

contactDetails.full_address: Madhya Pradesh Today Media Ltd, Plot No. 5, Press Complex Zone - 1, M.P. Nagar

faqs.question: What is the Madhya Pradesh Today IPO?
faqs.answer:
Madhya Pradesh Today IPO is a SME IPO of 2146500 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹14.17 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹66 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on September 19, 2017, and closes on September 21, 2017.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Madhya Pradesh Today IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Madhya Pradesh Today IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Madhya Pradesh Today IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Madhya Pradesh Today IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Madhya Pradesh Today IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Madhya Pradesh Today IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Madhya Pradesh Today IPO opens on September 19, 2017 and closes on September 21, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Madhya Pradesh Today IPO?
faqs.answer: Madhya Pradesh Today IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,32,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Madhya Pradesh Today IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Madhya Pradesh Today IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
